metadata.title: CVE-2024-41123 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
REXML is an XML toolkit for Ruby. The REXML gem before 3.3.2 has some DoSvulnerabilities when it parses an XML that has many specific characterssuch as whitespace character, `>]` and `]>`. The REXML gem 3.3.3 or laterinclude the patches to fix these vulnerabilities.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-41123` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.15
ruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.15
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-5ubuntu1.15').
jruby package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
